column5: Does anyone know the Quebec 2015 season open dates for walleye and pike? Planning my trip for mid-may. http://www.mffp.gouv.qc.ca/english/p...ng-periods.asp didn't have 2015 listed yet. Thanks, Kevin
I tried the link & it worked. What zone are you fishing in?
2015 start dates not listed yet.a3dad, use last year as a guide for 2015 or contact them. To be exact, I'd get the info from them.
Thanks guys. I'm fishing in zone 14 (the gouin).

I believe the Quebec walleye season typically opens on the third Friday in May. In years past, I've been unable to get exact information via telephone or email until late March. However, perhaps I just don't know the right person to contact.
For Zone 14 it will be Friday May 15.
